---
config:
  theme: base
  look: classic
---
flowchart LR
    subgraph Applications[Kubernetes Applications]
        Apps_Dev[Dev Environment Apps]
        Apps_UAT[UAT Environment Apps]
        Apps_Prod[Production Environment Apps]
    end

    subgraph Data_Collection[Observability Data Collection]
        %% Metrics Flow
        Apps_Dev -->|metrics| Prometheus_Dev
        Apps_UAT -->|metrics| Prometheus_UAT
        Apps_Prod -->|metrics| Prometheus_Prod
        
        %% Logs Flow
        Apps_Dev -->|logs| FluentBit_Dev
        Apps_UAT -->|logs| FluentBit_UAT
        Apps_Prod -->|logs| FluentBit_Prod
        
        %% Traces Flow
        Apps_Dev -->|traces| OTEL_Dev[OTEL Collector]
        Apps_UAT -->|traces| OTEL_UAT[OTEL Collector]
        Apps_Prod -->|traces| OTEL_Prod[OTEL Collector]
    end

    subgraph Central_Platform[Central Observability Platform]
        Prometheus_Central[Prometheus - Central]
        Thanos[Thanos Query]
        Alertmanager[Alertmanager]
        
        OpenSearch[OpenSearch Cluster]
        Kibana[Kibana]
        
        Jaeger[Jaeger]
        Grafana[Grafana - Unified Dashboards]
    end

    subgraph Alerting_Destinations[Alert Destinations]
        Slack_Dev[Slack - Dev Alerts]
        Slack_Prod[Slack - Prod Alerts]
        PagerDuty[PagerDuty - Critical]
    end

    %% Data Aggregation to Central Platform
    Prometheus_Dev --> Thanos
    Prometheus_UAT --> Thanos
    Prometheus_Prod --> Thanos
    
    FluentBit_Dev --> OpenSearch
    FluentBit_UAT --> OpenSearch
    FluentBit_Prod --> OpenSearch
    
    OTEL_Dev --> Jaeger
    OTEL_UAT --> Jaeger
    OTEL_Prod --> Jaeger

    %% Dashboard & Alerting Flow
    Thanos --> Grafana
    OpenSearch --> Grafana
    OpenSearch --> Kibana
    
    Prometheus_Central --> Alertmanager
    Alertmanager --> Slack_Dev
    Alertmanager --> Slack_Prod
    Alertmanager --> PagerDuty

    %% Deployment Health Monitoring
    ArgoCD[ArgoCD] -->|sync status| Prometheus_Central
    Grafana --> Deployment_Dash[Deployment Health Dashboard]
    Grafana --> Compliance_Dash[Compliance Dashboard]
    
    classDef dev fill:#e3f2fd
    classDef uat fill:#f3e5f5
    classDef prod fill:#ffebee
    classDef platform fill:#e8f5e8
    
    class Apps_Dev,Prometheus_Dev,FluentBit_Dev,OTEL_Dev dev
    class Apps_UAT,Prometheus_UAT,FluentBit_UAT,OTEL_UAT uat
    class Apps_Prod,Prometheus_Prod,FluentBit_Prod,OTEL_Prod prod
    class Central_Platform,Alerting_Destinations platform
